description: Generate realistic seed data for 11 test personas to enable local testing of all app states

userStories.title: Create persona seed structure and TypeScript types
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the directory structure and type definitions for persona seed data.
acceptanceCriteria: Create prisma/seed-data/personas/types.ts with PersonaSeed interface matching PRD spec
Types include: user, intake, subscription, program, workoutPlan, workoutLogs, checkIns, milestones
Export helper type for WorkoutSeed, WorkoutLogSeed, CheckInSeed

userStories.title: Create seedPersonas scaffolding in seed.ts
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the seeder function that will process persona JSON files.
acceptanceCriteria: Function reads all persona JSON files from prisma/seed-data/personas/
Creates related intake, subscription, program, workout plan data
Handles date calculations - converts relative dates (e.g., 'daysAgo: 5') to actual dates
Call seedPersonas() from main() after seedExercises()

userStories.title: Create Alex persona - Complete Beginner
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Alex: fresh user with 0 workouts, program exists but no activity.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: beginner, 3 days available, gym equipment
WorkoutPlan with 3 workouts (Day 1-3) using exercises from exercise library
No workout logs, no check-ins (fresh user)
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Sarah persona - Stay-at-Home Mom
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Sarah: early journey, sporadic attendance, free tier.
acceptanceCriteria: User: sarah@test.baisics.app, free, 0 current streak (missed 3 days)
Intake: female, returning after break, 3 days, home gym basics
4 workout logs with gaps - dates show sporadic pattern
Minimal set data - just completion, light weights
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Jordan persona - Home Workout
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Jordan: week2 stage, minimal logging, home equipment only.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: home workout, bands + bodyweight + light DBs, 4 days
7 workout logs with minimal set data (just marked complete)
Exercises: bodyweight and band variations only
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Chris persona - Time-Crunched Pro
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Chris: early stage, skipper behavior, paid tier.
acceptanceCriteria: Subscription: ACTIVE status with current period dates
Intake: busy professional, 30min max, 3 days, office gym
Skipped accessories in logs - only compound exercises completed
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Kim persona - Injury Recovery
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Kim: week2 stage with modifications, answered check-in too_hard.
acceptanceCriteria: User: kim@test.baisics.app, free, working around shoulder injury
Intake: injury recovery, cleared by PT, avoiding overhead
Program: 3-day modified full body, 10 weeks, week2CheckInShown: true, week2CheckInOption: 'too_hard'
Notes on exercises: 'did landmine press instead of OHP'
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Taylor persona - Lapsed User
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Taylor: lapsed with 14-day gap, recovery screen territory.
acceptanceCriteria: 12 workout logs: consistent first 3 weeks, then stopped
Last workout log dated 14 days ago
Good data for first 3 weeks, then nothing
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Robert persona - Senior Mobility
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Robert: cruising stage, meticulous logging, senior focus.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: senior, mobility focus, injury prevention, 3 days
16 workout logs with detailed set data
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Marcus persona - Gym Bro PPL
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Marcus: cruising stage, meticulous logging, paid tier, PPL split.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: intermediate, PPL split, 6 days, full gym
18 workout logs with full set data including weights and reps
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Priya persona - Weight Loss Journey
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Priya: cruising, streak builder, weight loss tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: weight loss focus, adding muscle, 4 days, full gym
Cardio notes in workout notes field
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Derek persona - Part 1: User and Program Structure
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Derek's foundation: user, intake, subscription, program, and workout plan structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: male, 34, former college football, strength focus, 4 days, powerlifting gym
WorkoutPlan with 4 workouts (5/3/1 style): Squat Day, Bench Day, Deadlift Day, OHP Day
Each workout has 4-5 exercises with proper sets/reps for 5/3/1
Initialize empty workoutLogs array (will be filled in next stories)

userStories.title: Create Derek persona - Part 2: Workout Logs 1-15
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Derek's first 15 workout logs with detailed set data.
acceptanceCriteria: Add workout logs 1-15 (first ~4 weeks of training)
Each log has full exerciseLogs with setLogs (weight, reps)
Starting weights: squat 315, bench 245, deadlift 365, OHP 155
Show 5/3/1 progression: week 1 (5s), week 2 (3s), week 3 (531), week 4 (deload)
Notes showing athlete mindset: 'felt explosive', 'getting my groove back'

userStories.title: Create Derek persona - Part 3: Workout Logs 16-30
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Derek's middle workout logs showing progression.
acceptanceCriteria: Weights progressing: squat 335, bench 255, deadlift 385, OHP 165
Continue 5/3/1 wave pattern with appropriate deload
Add PR notes on key lifts

userStories.title: Create Derek persona - Part 4: Workout Logs 31-45 + Milestones + Check-ins
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Derek's final workout logs, milestones, and check-ins.
acceptanceCriteria: Final weights: squat 365, bench 275, deadlift 405, OHP 175
Add 4 check-ins spread across the program with stats
PR celebration notes on final heavy lifts
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Create Maya persona - Part 1: First Program (completed)
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Maya's completed first program with 48 minimal workout logs.
acceptanceCriteria: Intake: female, 29, marathon runner, 2 days strength, home gym
First program: 'Runner's Strength Foundation', 24 weeks, COMPLETED, active: false
48 workout logs with MINIMAL data (quickLog: true style, no detailed sets)
Light weights throughout - strength supplements running

userStories.title: Create Maya persona - Part 2: Second Program + Milestone
userStories.description: As a tester, I need Maya's current program with 17 logs and milestone.
acceptanceCriteria: Add second program: '2-Day Maintenance', active: true
17 workout logs (minimal style) for current program
User totals: 65 workouts, streakCurrent based on recent activity
npx prisma db seed runs without error

userStories.title: Verify all personas seed correctly
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to verify the complete seeding works end-to-end.
acceptanceCriteria: Run npx prisma db seed successfully
All 11 personas exist in database with correct email addresses
Verify Derek has 45 workout logs and milestones WORKOUT_10, WORKOUT_25
Verify Maya has 2 programs (one inactive, one active) and 65 total workouts
Verify Taylor's last workout is 14 days ago
